description: 一定量の警告を受けたユーザーに自動的に制裁を加えることができるモジュールです。

enable.description: 自動モデレーションモジュールを有効にする

add.description: Add a level to the auto-moderator.

warnings.name: warnings
warnings.description: Number of warnings the user must have to reach this level.

action.name: action
action.description: Action to take when someone reaches this level.

time.name: time
time.description: Time of the action (in case of being temporary).

remove.description: Remove a level to the auto-moderator.

docs.description: 自動モデレーションモジュールのドキュメントのリンクを取得します。

view.description: View the settings of the auto-moderation module.

reset.description: モジュールの設定を元に戻す (データの復旧はできません)。

confirmation.name: confirmation
confirmation.description: Are you really sure you want to reset the data for this module?

set.description: Set the parameters of an auto-moderator level.

warnings.name: warnings
warnings.description: Number of warnings the user must have to reach this level.

action.name: action
action.description: Action to take when someone reaches this level.

time.name: time
time.description: Time of the action (in case of being temporary).
